feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Resource Redirect 1.1.6
entry.content:
• Improved DirectUI resources redirection (usually UIFILE and XML) to not affect sub resources such as strings, which are now loaded from the original file.
  • Improved icon cache invalidation when settings change and when the mod is unloaded.

entry.title: Cycle taskbar buttons with mouse wheel 1.1.6
entry.content:
• Added a workaround for keyboard shortcuts not working after sleep.
  • Improved keyboard handling to use the monitor with the mouse cursor instead of always using the primary monitor.

entry.title: Taskbar classic context menu 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar classic context menu

Show the classic context menu when right-clicking on taskbar items. You can hold the Shift key to show the default jump list.

Only Windows 10 64-bit and Windows 11 are supported. For other Windows versions check out 7+ Taskbar Tweaker.

Note: To customize the old taskbar on Windows 11 (if using ExplorerPatcher or a similar tool), enable the relevant option in the mod's settings.

entry.title: Classic Explorer Treeview 1.1.2
entry.content: • Added a option to enable item hot tracking

entry.title: Classic context menu on Windows 11 1.0
entry.content:
Classic context menu on Windows 11

Always show the classic context menu without having to select "Show More Options" or hold Shift.

You can hold the Ctrl key to temporarily disable the mod and open the new menu.

entry.title: Classic Theme Enable with extended compatibility 1.3.1
entry.content: • CPU usage optimization for the console session, which may wait for the session activation for a long time.

entry.title: Disable grouping on the taskbar 1.3.7
entry.content: • Fixed support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.

entry.title: Middle click to close on the taskbar 1.0.7
entry.content:
• Holding Ctrl while middle clicking will end the running task. The key combination can be configured or disabled in the mod settings.
  • Added support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar. Versions newer than 22621.3880.66.6 are supported. The "Customize the old taskbar on Windows 11" option must be enabled for the mod to work with the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.

entry.title: Classic Theme Enable with extended compatibility 1.3.0
entry.content: • Fixed issue of video drivers not starting properly in some computers when Windhawk with Classic theme mod is started very early during system start.

entry.title: Disable grouping on the taskbar 1.3.6
entry.content:
• Fixed multiple pinned items sometimes appearing for the same program when using multiple monitors.
  • Fixed pinned items getting an incorrect icon in some cases.
  • Added support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar. Versions newer than 22621.3880.66.6 are supported. The "Customize the old taskbar on Windows 11" option must be enabled for the mod to work with the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.

entry.title: Hold Teams meeting thumbnail in place 1.0
entry.content:
Maintain Teams meeting thumbnail window position

By default, Teams has an annoying feature. When Teams meeting window is minimised into a small overlay, and the user manually places that overlay into some location, then Teams later moves the overlay window into another location. If the user moves it back to their desired location, then after some time Teams overrides that again. This obviously interferes with usage of other programs.

Lets stop the micromanagement!

Current mod lets the user change the location of the minimised meeting thumbnail window as usual, but prevents Teams from moving the thumbnail window around on its own.

entry.title: Classic List Group Fix 1.1.0
entry.content:
• Add option to visually hide the collapse button
  • Correct header font
  • Adapt header height to font, fonts larger than 8pt will look correct now
  • General code cleanup, match modern Windhawk standards
  • Refine mod description and README

entry.title: Disable Taskbar Thumbnails 1.0
entry.content:
Disable Taskbar Thumbnails

Disable taskbar thumbnails on hover, or replace them with a list.

Only Windows 10 64-bit and Windows 11 are supported. For other Windows versions check out 7+ Taskbar Tweaker.

Note: To customize the old taskbar on Windows 11 (if using ExplorerPatcher or a similar tool), enable the relevant option in the mod's settings.

entry.title: Remove Command Bar 1.0.1
entry.content: Limit to 64bit architecture.

entry.title: Classic Explorer Treeview 1.1.1

entry.title: Taskbar on top for Windows 11 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Improved jump list size and position handling.
  • Adjusted the 1px taskbar border to be at the bottom of the taskbar.
  • Fixed the start menu disappearing or being positioned incorrectly sometimes.

entry.title: Vertical Taskbar for Windows 11 1.2.5
entry.content:
• Improved tray overflow position, now it's vertically centered to the mouse position and isn't shown far away from the taskbar.
  • Fixed right click menu location for some tray icons.
  • Fixed jump list width on high DPIs.

entry.title: Taskbar Background Helper 1.0.1
entry.content:
• Added an optional configuration for dark mode.
  • Improved maximized window detection.
